ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T00:50:29 [Issue ID 4000-953193] urn:comicvine:4000-953193 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:08:12. [Issue ID 2447249]
ComicInfo.Summary: Stargazer Part 3: Picard and the Jenjorans are captured by Reska and the Reman survivors who plan to exploit the remaining Jenjoran resources. Meanwhile in orbit, Captain Mekara and the Stargazer confront Commander Xenius and a Romulan warbird. The Stargazer has the upper hand until Xenius manages to transport Picard and Reska aboard the Romulan ship to use as hostages.
ComicInfo.Tags: Hiro,Xenius,Romulans,Sing,Moshe,Starfleet,Seven of Nine,Remans,Urtern,Stargazer Crew,Reska,Kemi,Mekara,Jean-Luc Picard,Kathryn Janeway,Fenris Rangers,Deet
